snippet: Though embroiled in a long-term conflict with Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York, Mayor Bill de Blasio has now embraced a feud with the New Jersey governor.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio makes number of pointed criticisms of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's objections to United States policy of accepting Syrian refugees; de Blasio's decision to publicly battle Christie could be useful politically in helping him gain support among his base, in contrast to his ongoing and more politically risky feud with New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: Though embroiled in a long-term conflict with Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York, Mayor Bill de Blasio has now embraced a feud with the New Jersey governor.

headline.main: De Blasio, Drawing New Battle Line, Takes Aim at Christie on Refugees
headline.print_headline: Drawing a New Battle Line, De Blasio Takes On Christie

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
